snippet: Power was restored to tens of thousands of residents in Lower Manhattan, although those in other boroughs, on Long Island and in New Jersey, will not know when their power will come back.
abstract: Power returns for tens of thousands of residents in Lower Manhattan, four days after Hurricane Sandy blew through the region; Consolidated Edison officials report that prognosis for full restoration in other boroughs and in the suburbs are grimmer, saying that it could take until mid-November before all of its customers, especially those in Westchester County, have their electricity again.
lead_paragraph: Power was restored to tens of thousands of residents in Lower Manhattan, although those in other boroughs, on Long Island and in New Jersey, will not know when their power will come back.

headline.main: As Power Is Restored for Some, Others Face Grim Outlook
headline.print_headline: Lights Are Coming Back in Lower Manhattan

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Public Service Electric and Gas Co
